name: Jung
description:
Jung is a simple auto-battle card game, where you command an army of creatures and wield magical spells to topple your enemy's strongholds while protecting your own. 

How to Play

Click and drag cards onto the field to summon units or cast spells. Cards cost energy, which you gain over time. You control the left field, your enemies control the right field. If you have more towers standing than your foe when time expires, you win!

Development Progress

Today, Jung is just a prototype. In the future, the goal is for Jung to become a run-based game (aka rogue-lite), where you will develop your deck of creatures and spells to grow more powerful, acquire artifacts that give you unique bonuses, and fight ever more powerful enemies on your quest. As Jung is just a passion side-project, this will probably take a long time to happen, if it ever happens :P
